sentences.en: ...seaweed washed up on a beach.
sentences.cn: …被冲上海滩的海草。

sentences.en: Be careful while swimming and do not get caught in the seaweed.
sentences.cn: 游泳时你可千万小心,不要让海草缠住.

sentences.en: Certain species of seaweed have been reported to contain appreciable quantities of Vitamin B 12.
sentences.cn: 曾有报道某些种海藻含有相当量的维生素B12.

sentences.en: Fish and seaweed rose, caught motionless in the surging water.
sentences.cn: 鱼和海藻浮起来，在汹涌的水流中动弹不得。

sentences.en: Guillemots dived into the sea, sometimes picking up oil - coated pieces of seaweed for their nests.
sentences.cn: 海鸠们潜到海水里去, 间或衔出覆有石油的海藻来筑窝.

sentences.en: In many places, like Japan, people get iodine from seafood, seaweed, vegetables grown in iodine-rich soil or animals that eat grass grown in that soil.
sentences.cn: 像日本等许多地方，人们通过食用海鲜、海藻得到碘，还可以从生长在高碘土壤里的蔬菜或食草动物那里得到碘。

sentences.en: Land that was once at the bottom of the sea now lies around the town in wide, fertile fields; where crabs once crawled, donkeys pick their way; in place of seaweed, roses grow.
sentences.cn: 曾经是海底的陆地现在成了广阔肥沃的田野，在城市的四周伸展开来，这里曾经有过螃蟹爬行，现在则有驴子择路而行，生长出了海藻和玫瑰花。

sentences.en: Look! There is fish, seaweed and shells in my aquarium.
sentences.cn: 你看, 我的鱼缸里有鱼, 海草和贝壳.

sentences.en: Seaweed baths can help to detoxify the body.
sentences.cn: 海藻浴有助于身体解毒。

sentences.en: So the next time you see a chunk of seaweed ... notice the beauty of it, yes.
sentences.cn: 所以下次你碰见一大片海藻时，要毫不犹豫的欣赏它的美。

sentences.en: Suddenly she was entangled in the seaweed.
sentences.cn: 突然间她被海草缠住了.

sentences.en: The crabs come closer to shore at this time of year, Child said, where they feed on the seaweed.
sentences.cn: 这些螃蟹每年这个时间，要来到这里海岸的边上，恰尔特说，它们以吃海藻为生。

sentences.en: The fossils appear to be an early form of seaweed washed up on a beach.
sentences.cn: 这些化石看上去是被海水冲上岸的一种早期的水藻。

sentences.en: The rocks had green seaweed growing on them.
sentences.cn: 礁石上生长着绿色的海藻.

sentences.en: The seaweed felt cold and slimy.
sentences.cn: 海藻摸起来冷冰冰黏糊糊的.

sentences.en: The seaweed is too thick here for us to swim.
sentences.cn: 这里的海草太密了,我们不能游泳.

sentences.en: The ship ran afoul of the floating seaweed.
sentences.cn: 船只和漂浮的海草纠缠在一起.

sentences.en: The smell of seaweed took him back to his childhood.
sentences.cn: 海草的气味使他回想起童年时代.

sentences.en: The underside of the rock was covered with seaweed.
sentences.cn: 岩石的下面布满了海草.

sentences.en: This substance is extracted from seaweed.
sentences.cn: 这种物质是从海藻中提取的.

trans.tran_en: a plant that grows in the sea
